^(exitCode)$.description: exit_code is sent only in the final message.

^(mimeType)$.description: This is only sent once in the first response containing stdout_data.
^(mimeType)$.title: mime_type is a detected MIME type of the stdout_data.

^(stderrData)$.description: stderr_data contains bytes from stderr since the last response.

^(stdoutData)$.description: stdout_data contains bytes from stdout since the last response.

exit_code.description: exit_code is sent only in the final message.

mime_type.description: This is only sent once in the first response containing stdout_data.
mime_type.title: mime_type is a detected MIME type of the stdout_data.

pid.description:
pid contains the process' PID
 this is only sent once in an initial response for background processes.

stderr_data.description: stderr_data contains bytes from stderr since the last response.

stdout_data.description: stdout_data contains bytes from stdout since the last response.
